Perhaps something like:

<junit>
<batchtest>
<fileset dir="${src.tests}">
<include name="**/*Test*.java"/>
<not>
<contains text="abstract class" casesensitive="yes"/>
</not>
</fileset>
</batchtest>
</junit>

would do the trick. This is my first stab at this and I have not run it...
